Replacement File¶

Two files are used to accomplish the automated parameter replacement functionality in GSSHA models.

Replace Parameter File¶

File extension: None

class gsshapy.orm.ReplaceParamFile(directory, filename, session)¶
tableName = 'rep_replace_param_files'¶

Database tablename

id¶

PK

numParameters¶

INTEGER

projectFile¶

RELATIONSHIP

targetParameters¶

RELATIONSHIP

read()¶

Read file into the database.

write(session, directory, name)¶

Write from database to file.

session = SQLAlchemy session object

directory = to which directory will the files be written (e.g.: ‘/example/path’)

name = project name (e.g.: ‘my_project’)

Table Objects¶

class gsshapy.orm.TargetParameter(targetVariable, varFormat)¶
tableName = 'rep_target_parameter'¶

Database tablename

id¶

PK

replaceParamFileID¶

FK

replaceParamFile¶

RELATIONSHIP

targetVariable¶

STRING

varFormat¶

STRING

Replace Value File¶

File extension: None

class gsshapy.orm.ReplaceValFile(directory, filename, session)¶
tableName = 'rep_replace_val_files'¶

Database tablename

id¶

PK

values¶

STRING

projectFile¶

RELATIONSHIP

read()¶

Read file into the database.

write(session, directory, name)¶

Write from database to file.

session = SQLAlchemy session object

directory = to which directory will the files be written (e.g.: ‘/example/path’)

name = project name (e.g.: ‘my_project’)
